thread.section_title: Hotel Artemide - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Wonderful
thread.title_full: Wonderful - Review of Hotel Artemide, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: luvlife23
title: Wonderful
text: What a great hotel. Just checked in...staff is very patient and accommodating. Hotel is located right in the midst of all the center of all the action. It's no more than a 25 minute stroll to most sights, eatery, shopping, ect. The hotel itself, the second you walk in you are greeted with a chic but modern decor. Our room was modern and the layout is great. 2 climate zones, clean and comfortable. 4th floor with 2 balconies. What a great stay.
